behaviors: fleeing, traveling, running, foraging, gathering, eating, fighting amongst themselves, fighting, hiding, nesting, yelling at themselves, yelling, sleeping, searching, dancing, singing to themselves, singing, resting, investigating, negotiating, negotiating with, repairing, hunting, scouting, setting traps, tracking, climbing something, making art, writing, felling a tree, sightseeing, drinking, crafting, digging, swimming, bathing, playing games, telling stories, dancing together, worshipping, meditating, teaching, learning, competing, celebrating, mourning, healing, building, negotiating, discussing
complications: being chased, starvation, being affected by a magical abnormality, being disorganized, being nervous, being oblivious, arguing amongst themselves, escaped captives, being affected by an enchantment, being depressed about a tragedy, being concerned, being lost, being cursed, being injured, being haunted, being betrayed, panic, insanity, being diseased, being on death's door, being drunk, being involved with, having language issues with

complicationExtraDetails.insanities: delusion, paranoia, being catatonic, psychosis, being a sociopath, masochism, sadism, addictions, narcissism, hallucinations, hysteria, confusion, disorientation
complicationExtraDetails.magical abnormalities: way too small, way too big, charmed, asleep, floating, sparkling, followed by lightning clouds, erratic time adjustments, time is slowed, time is fast, things they touch come to life, emotions spread like a disease, magic casts are unpredictable, elemental control, memory loss, merged senses, polymorph into something cute, polymorph into something creepy, polymorph into something silly, when they speak they charm creatures, animal friendship
complicationExtraDetails.enchantments: charmed, uncontrollable laughter, uncontrollable dancing, random race changes, forced to tell the truth, inconsolingly lonely, shadow runs away, imagination makes illusions
